summary: Expand the app from a water drinking reminder into a broader health reminders and tracking app (including sleep scheduling, running tracking, and other health reminders/trackers).

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in so reminders, settings, and intake history are stored per user Principal.
Build the main UI to configure hydration settings: daily water goal, reminder interval, active hours window, and default cup size.

Add an in-app reminder scheduler that triggers during the configured active hours and uses browser Notification API (local notifications) when permission is granted; otherwise show an in-app toast/banner reminder.
Implement intake logging UX: quick-add buttons based on default cup size (e.g., +1 cup, +250ml, custom amount) and display today’s progress toward the daily goal.
Provide a history/stats view for recent intake (at minimum: today and the last 7 days) with a simple chart or list breakdown.

Apply a coherent visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, layout) appropriate for a calm hydration/health app and use it consistently across all pages and components (avoid blue/purple as the primary palette).
Add generated static image assets to the frontend and use them in the UI (e.g., app header/empty states) by serving them from frontend/public/assets/generated (not via backend).
Extend the frontend UI to include new sections for Sleep and Running, alongside existing Hydration features, using clear navigation within the existing App layout.
Add React Query hooks and frontend data flow for sleep, running, and custom reminders using the existing actor-based pattern.

Update the in-app reminder scheduler to support triggering reminders for the new reminder types (sleep and user-defined health reminders) in addition to hydration, using browser Notifications when permitted and otherwise an in-app banner/toast.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a water drinking reminder app
Create backend data models and APIs to store and retrieve a user’s hydration settings and intake log.
Add a sleep scheduler (sleep reminders, scheduling, and related tracking).
Add a running tracker (log runs and view basic running stats/history).
Support additional health reminders and trackers beyond hydration (configurable reminder types and tracking categories).
Add backend data models and actor APIs for sleep scheduling and sleep tracking stored per authenticated caller Principal.
Add backend data models and actor APIs for a running tracker that lets an authenticated user log runs and view basic running history/stats stored per caller Principal.
Add backend support for additional (non-hydration) health reminders by allowing users to create, update, list, and delete custom reminder definitions stored per caller Principal.

projectName: Water Drinking Reminder App (settings, reminders, and intake tracking)
